title: Witch Bolt
content:
Lvl 1 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Witch Bolt Information

Description: Link yourself to a target with a bolt of lightning. Deal an additional 1~12 Lightning damage each turn by activating it using your Action.
